questions.instruction:
Questions 1–8
Reading Passage 1 has eight paragraphs A–H.
Choose the correct heading for each paragraph from the list of headings below.
Drag a heading from the list and drop it onto the correct paragraph's answer box on the left.
List of Headings i. Not enough tea to meet demand ii. Religious objections iii. In - and sometimes out – of fashion iv. A connection between tea and religion v. A luxury item vi. News of tea reaches another continent vii. Is tea a good or a bad thing? viii. A chance discovery ix. Tea-making as a ritual x. Difficulties in importing tea

options.label: i
options.text: Not enough tea to meet demand
